power.title: Blade Sweep
power.fluff: Though the fury of your attack is directed at a single foe, no nearby enemy is spared your wrath

section.text: Each bloodied enemy within your reach takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: Non-bloodied enemies within your reach also take the damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: One bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: You can choose a non-bloodied enemy instead.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: A second bloodied enemy within your reach, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Blood Strike
power.fluff: Blood calls to blood, your and your enemy's pain giving strength to your assault

section.text: If you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll
If the target is bloodied, the attack deals +1d12 damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the target is bloodied, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Brutal Slam
power.fluff: Your forceful blow pushes your foe into its companions

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature that is smaller than you, your size, or one size larger than you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
As long as the forced movement wasn't negated, one enemy adjacent to the target takes 6 + your Strength modifier damage.
